title: White Sangria
directions: In a large pitcher stir together citrus juices, seltzer water or club soda, ginger ale, wine, Pimm's, and half of orange and lemon wedges.
Add ice cubes and serve sangr√≠a with remaining orange and lemon wedges.
ingredients: 1 cup seltzer water or club soda
A 750-ml. bottle dry white wine, chilled
